paragraph.paragraph: Syntax auto-complete in EiffelStudio editor is twofold :

item.paragraph: The editor can close brackets ("(", "{" and "[") and quotes(""", "'" and "`") automatically. This feature is disabled by default. It can be activated in the editor preferences.
